meanings.definition: An unspecified large number of things
meanings.sent1: There were hundreds of stars twinkling in the night sky.
meanings.sent2: She collected hundreds of seashells on the beach.
meanings.sent3: The magician pulled out hundreds of colorful scarves from his hat.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the room like hundreds of bells ringing.
meanings.sent5: The forest was filled with hundreds of chirping birds.

meanings.definition: A group or set of one hundred individuals or things
meanings.sent1: The school choir consisted of hundreds of students.
meanings.sent2: The factory produced hundreds of shoes every day.
meanings.sent3: The birthday party had hundreds of balloons floating around.
meanings.sent4: The football stadium was packed with fans, hundreds cheering for their team.
meanings.sent5: The library had hundreds of books neatly arranged on the shelves.
